create_text_to_sound.description: Convert input text into “sound effects” using an AI model.

props.name: prompt
props.description: A clear, descriptive explanation of the desired audio effect. Concise prompts yield more accurate results.

props.name: duration
props.description: The desired length of the audio in seconds (max 10). Defaults to 8 if not set.

props.name: project_name
props.description: A memorable name for your project to help organize tasks in your Camb.ai workspace.

create_text_to_speech.description: Convert text into speech using a specified voice, language, gender, and age group.

props.name: text
props.description: The text to be converted to speech.

props.name: age
props.description: The age of the speaker to be generated.

props.name: project_name
props.description: A memorable name for your project to help organize tasks in your Camb.ai workspace.

create_transcription.description: Creates a task to process speech into readable text.

props.name: source_type
props.description: Choose whether to upload a file or provide a URL.

props.name: media
props.description: The media file (e.g., MP3, WAV, MP4) to transcribe. Max size: 20MB.

props.name: project_name
props.description: A memorable name for your project to help organize tasks in your Camb.ai workspace.

create_translation.description: Translate text from a source language to a target language.

props.name: texts
props.description: The text to be translated. You can enter multiple lines; each line will be treated as a separate text segment.

props.name: formality
props.description: Adjust the formality level to match your context.

props.name: gender
props.description: Specify grammatical gender preferences when relevant in the target language.

props.name: age
props.description: Helps adjust vocabulary and expressions to be age-appropriate.

props.name: project_name
props.description: A memorable name for your project to help organize tasks in your Camb.ai workspace.
